articles.title: Hollywood execs stay silent on Will Smith Oscar incident - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description:

articles.title: Avian Influenza: Oregon Department of Agriculture issues advisory - Cannon Beach Gazette
articles.description: The World Organization for Animal Health (OIE) has confirmed a bald eagle found dead in British Columbia, Canada tested positive for the highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) Eurasian strain H5N1.

articles.title: Oscars 2022: Troy Kotsur wins best supporting actor for CODA - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description:
LOS ANGELES, March 27 : Troy Kotsur became the first deaf man to win an Oscar, taking the Academy Award on Sunday for best supporting actor for his role as a fisherman and father in family drama "CODA."
